selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To compute the remaining number of objects after subtraction.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to evaluate the expression representing the total number of objects minus the count of large rubber spheres and big shiny cylinders.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer for output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the computed number of remaining objects into the required output format.
